posts.post_content: Oh you'll pick it in Limited. It might not be your first pick, or your second, or even your twelfth, but by gum you'll pick it eventually. And it will stay in your opening hand, mocking you with its 2/2 4W awfulness, waiting, just waiting for you to get enough mana to play it just so you can see your opponent's face when you go all-in, tap out, and windmill slam this 2/2 Flyer on the table.
posts.html:
Oh you'll pick it in Limited. It might not be your first pick, or your second, or even your twelfth, but by gum you'll pick it eventually. And it will stay in your opening hand, mocking you with its 2/2 4W awfulness, waiting, just waiting for you to get enough mana to play it just so you can see your opponent's face when you go all-in, tap out, and windmill slam this 2/2 Flyer on the table.
